input.sentences: the family was vacation in location .
there were a lot of people selling things on the street .
some sold things in their small boats .
there was food sold in the street markets .
this included lots of fresh vegetables .
output.sentences: This family vacation was sure to be interesting, the location unique.
Many people lined the street, selling flowers, goods and produce.
Some even had goods which they sold from their boats along the dock.
Vendors and street markets sold fresh, delicious looking food!
Lots of wonderful looking vegetables were included at every booth.
